summary: Request to upsert TemporalChangeVersion on patch updates. This feature was implemented in PR #1072 with the latest Core and requires server version 1.20 or later to take effect.
userImpact: Users can now automatically update TemporalChangeVersion when applying patches, improving version management workflows.
proposedFix: Implemented via PR #1072 with latest Core
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented in PR #1072 with latest Core, requires server version 1.20+
keyQuote: This will now happen as of #1072 with latest Core. Requires server version 1.20 to take effect.
